thread.title: PREVIEW: The Safari Party, Plaza Theatre, Romsey
thread.title_full: PREVIEW: The Safari Party, Plaza Theatre, Romsey

title: PREVIEW: The Safari Party, Plaza Theatre, Romsey
text:
0 comments 
FROM the writer of Calendar Girls, Flint Street Nativity and Neville's Island comes the biting, witty comedy The Safari Party. 
Three households in Cheshire have agreed to hold a "safari party": a dinner party, each course of which is served in a different house. 
The three households appear to be socially well-matched. However: a mysterious dining table introduces an unsettling and disturbing theme into the party... 
As the evening progresses, lies are told, truths are revealed, and matters turn satisfyingly messy and violent. Share article 
Tim Firth's comedy is brought to the Plaza stage by RAODS. 
Tickets from plazatheatre.com or 01794 512987. Promoted Stories PREVIEW: The Safari Party, Plaza Theatre, Romsey Sorry, an error occurred.
